alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of western Lamoille, north central Addison, southeastern Chittenden, northwestern Washington and south central Franklin Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower over Monkton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morrisville, Ferrisburg, Johnson Village, Cambridge, Cambridge Village, Stowe, Monkton Ridge, Monkton, Monkton Boro, Jeffersonville Village, Williston, Bolton, Richmond, Mt. Philo State Park, Underhill, Jericho, Hinesburg, St. George, Huntington and Kingsland Bay State Park. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 67 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
